title: FS: T206 Harry McIntyre Bkln and Chicago  EXMT
author: perezfan

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Harry McIntyre Bkln and Chicago  EXMT
posts.post_content:
Yes, it is raw.... 

I bought most of my T206 cards back in the early-mid 90s, and have never submitted them for grading. This would be an excellent candidate for grading, if so desired.  It should grade at least a "6".  

Sharp corners, perfect edges, beautiful centering and great registration... not to mention those beautiful pastel colors.  

Asking $339 OBO  After looking at what's available on eBay (and the lack of anything in this grade), I feel this price is a steal.  But am happy to entertain offers from whoever is interested.

Thanks for looking!
